block:
{
  "componentId": "custom-card-1",
  "componentName": "container",
  "componentProps": {},
  "componentSlots": {},
  "componentEvents": {
    "focus": {
      "event": "focus",
      "action": "Run Script",
      "script": "document.querySelector('[data-component-id=\"custom-card-1\"]').style.transform = 'scale(1.05)'; document.querySelector('[data-component-id=\"custom-card-1\"]').style.boxShadow = 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 10px 15px -3px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 4px 6px -4px';"
    },
    "blur": {
      "event": "blur",
      "action": "Run Script",
      "script": "document.querySelector('[data-component-id=\"custom-card-1\"]').style.transform = 'scale(1)'; document.querySelector('[data-component-id=\"custom-card-1\"]').style.boxShadow = 'none';"
    }
  },
  "blockName": "container",
  "children": [
    {
      "componentId": "custom-card-icon-wrapper-1",
      "componentName": "container",
      "componentProps": {},
      "componentSlots": {},
      "componentEvents": {},
      "blockName": "container",
      "children": [
        {
          "componentId": "custom-card-image-1",
          "componentName": "ImageView",
          "componentProps": {
            "url": "/files/checklist-svgrepo-com.svg",
            "altText": "Item Enquiry Icon",
            "image": "{{ inputs.iconImage }}",
            "alt": "{{ inputs.imgALT }}"
          },
          "componentSlots": {},
          "componentEvents": {},
          "blockName": "ImageView",
          "children": [],
          "baseStyles": {
            "width": "50px",
            "height": "50px",
            "objectFit": "contain"
          },
          "rawStyles": {},
          "mobileStyles": {
            "width": "30px",
            "height": "30px",
            "objectFit": "contain"
          },
          "tabletStyles": {},
          "classes": []
        }
      ],
      "baseStyles": {
        "display": "flex",
        "alignItems": "center",
        "justifyContent": "center",
        "height": "120px",
        "width": "120px",
        "borderRadius": "50%",
        "background": "#e5e7eb",
        "marginBottom": "16px"
      },
      "rawStyles": {},
      "mobileStyles": {
        "height": "45px",
        "width": "45px",
        "marginBottom": "8px"
      },
      "tabletStyles": {},
      "classes": []
    },
    {
      "componentId": "custom-card-title-1",
      "componentName": "TextBlock",
      "componentProps": {
        "text": "{{ inputs.titleText }}",
        
        "fontWeight": "font-semibold"
      },
      "componentSlots": {},
      "componentEvents": {},
      "blockName": "TextBlock",
      "children": [],
      "baseStyles": {
        "color": "#1f2937",
        "textAlign": "center"
      },
      "rawStyles": {},
      "mobileStyles": {
        "fontSize": "text-sm"
        },
      "tabletStyles": {},
      "classes": ["text-sm",
    "md:text-lg"]
    },
    {
      "componentId": "TextBlock-2jvxfg5db",
      "componentName": "TextBlock",
      "componentProps": {
        "text": "{{ inputs.subTitleText }}",
        "fontSize": "text-sm",
        "fontWeight": "font-medium"
      },
      "componentSlots": {},
      "componentEvents": {},
      "blockName": "TextBlock",
      "children": [],
      "baseStyles": {
        "color": "#1f2937",
        "textAlign": "center"
      },
      "rawStyles": {},
      "mobileStyles": {
        "fontSize": "text-sm"
      },
      "tabletStyles": {},
      "classes": []
    }
  ],
  "baseStyles": {
    "display": "flex",
    "flexDirection": "column",
    "alignItems": "center",
    "justifyContent": "center",
    "padding": "24px",
    "background": "#ffffff",
    "borderRadius": "12px",
    "cursor": "pointer",
    "height": "100%"
  },
  "rawStyles": {},
  "mobileStyles": {
    "width": "60px",
    "minWidth": "60px",
    "height": "fit-content",
    "padding": "8px",
    "flexShrink": 0
  },
  "tabletStyles": {},
  "classes": [
    "shadow-md",
    "transition-all",
    "duration-200",
    "ease-in-out",
    "hover:scale-105",
    "hover:shadow-xl",
    "active:scale-100"
  ]
}
name: itemsicon
